check_for_updates.name: Check for updates
check_for_updates.description: Check for updates when launching this program

set_registry_keys.name: Set registry keys
set_registry_keys.description: Set registry keys when launching this program, used to launch Roblox from the website

confirm_launch_if_roblox_running.name: Confirm launch when Roblox is running
confirm_launch_if_roblox_running.description: Ask for confirmation to kill existing Roblox instances before launching Roblox

show_deployment_info_on_launch.name: Show deployment info
show_deployment_info_on_launch.description: Show information about the latest Roblox version when running the launcher

force_roblox_reinstallation.name: Force Roblox reinstallation
force_roblox_reinstallation.description: Force Roblox to be reinstalled on next launch

disable_all_mods.name: Disable mods
disable_all_mods.description: Prevents any mods from being applied

disable_all_fastflags.name: Disable FastFlags
disable_all_fastflags.description: Prevents any FastFlags from being applied (may break Discord RPC)

restore_default_files.name: Always restore default files
restore_default_files.description: Always restores Roblox's default files before applying mods
